Title: Guide to Accessing and Utilizing Free API Keys on OpenRouter.ai
Content: This guide outlines the steps for accessing and utilizing free API keys on OpenRouter.ai. Users must create an account and log in, then filter for free models in the models section. After identifying these models, users can create an API key in their profile, which is essential for authenticating requests. The guide further details how to configure the API by locating the base URL and entering the API key into the configuration file. Finally, it explains how to identify free models in the 'pair' chat interface, ensuring users can effectively utilize the available resources without incurring costs.
